<body lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=WordSection1>

  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span lang=FR style='font-size:16.0pt;color:#333333;
  mso-ansi-language:FR'>Zhaoxia <span class=SpellE>Yu</span>, <span

  <p class=MsoNormal><span lang=FR style='font-size:8.0pt;color:#333333;
  mso-ansi-language:FR'><br>
  </span><span style='color:#333333'>Department of Statistics <br>

  <p style='margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

<p style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:0in;margin-left:15.1pt;
margin-bottom:.0001pt'><b><i><span style='font-size:8.0pt;color:#333333'><o:p> </o:p></span></i></b></p>

<p style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:0in;margin-left:15.1pt;
margin-bottom:.0001pt'><b><i><span style='font-size:13.5pt;color:#333333'>Research
Interests</span></i></b><span style='font-size:4.0pt;color:#333333'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:0in;margin-left:15.1pt;
margin-bottom:.0001pt'><span style='color:#333333'>Statistical modeling. In particular,
statistical genetics, imaging genetics, and bioinformatics<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:0in;margin-left:15.1pt;
margin-bottom:.0001pt'><span style='color:#333333'><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:0in;margin-left:15.1pt;
margin-bottom:.0001pt'><b><i><span style='font-size:13.5pt;color:#333333'>Current
Teaching</span></i></b><span style='font-size:4.0pt;color:#333333'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:0in;margin-left:15.1pt;
margin-bottom:.0001pt'><span style='color:#333333'>Statistics 120C<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:0in;margin-left:15.1pt;
margin-bottom:.0001pt'><span style='color:#333333'>Statistics 200C<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style='margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt'><span style='color:#333333'><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:0in;margin-left:15.1pt;
margin-bottom:.0001pt'><span style='color:#333333'>Courses that I taught
before: STAT8, STAT120ABC STAT120C, STAT140/240, STAT257, STAT262, STAT200ABC<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style='margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt'><span style='color:#333333'><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:0in;margin-left:15.1pt;
margin-bottom:.0001pt'><b><i><span style='font-size:13.5pt;color:#333333'>Selected
peer-reviewed articles<o:p></o:p></span></i></b></p>

href="publications/publications.htm">here</a></b>)<o:p></o:p></span></p>
